snippet.title: Space Mercs - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Space Mercs - the extreme arcade 3D space combat game is coming to steam at the end of July 2019! 

Fight in battles with hundreds of ships, make your way through hundreds of projectiles and become the best space mercenary in all quadrants of the galaxy!

Wishlist the game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1088600/Space_Mercs/
